general.a1: Bugisu High School esangibwa mu Mbale, Uganda, okumpi n'ekibuga wakati.
general.q2: Essomero lya kusoma ku tto oba lya sulawo?
general.a2: Tulina okusomerako n'okusulawo okusobola okuwa obuweereza ebyenjawulo eri abawandiisi n'abazadde.
general.a3: Ofiisi enkulu eggulawo okuva ku Mmande okutuuka ku Lwokutaano essaawa 2:00 ez'oku makya okutuuka ku 11:00 ez'olweggulo, ne ku Lwomukaaga essaawa 3:00 okutuuka ku 7:00.

admissions.q1: Ddi lwe mutandika okuyingiza abayizi aba kalenda empya?
admissions.a1: Okuyingiza abayizi kutandika mu mwezi gwa Museenene (November) ogw'omwaka oguddako. Naye tukkiriza okumanya ebisingawo ebbanga lyonna.
admissions.q2: Ebisaanyizo eby'okuyingira mu S1 ze ki?
admissions.a2: Abasaba okuyingira mu S1 balina okuba ne PLE results slip, ebbaluwa okuva mu ssomero gye wavudde, n'ebifaananyi bibiri ebya paasipooti.
admissions.a3: Yee, tuguwa bbasale okusinziira ku ngeri omuyizi gye yakolamu mu PLE ne UCE.

academics.q1: Kalenda y'emisomo gye mukozesa ye ki?
academics.a1: Tugoberera Kalenda y'Eggwanga ya Uganda ekwata ku masomo ga O-Level ne A-Level.
academics.a2: Yee, kompyuta lisomo lya mpaka mu O-Level era n'abo mu A-Level basobola okulironda, nga tulina ne labu ya kompyuta emanyiddwa obulungi.

student_life.a1: Tulina emizannyo mingi omuli Omupiira, Netball, Okuyimba, Okuzina n'Omuzannyo, Kibiina ky'Okuwakanya (Debating), n'ekya Sayansi.
student_life.a2: Yee, tulina sikibeya (sickbay) erimu eddagala era ne nnaasi asobola okuyamba mu mbeera y'obulwadde ey'amangu essaawa 24.

cta_desc: Tuli wano okukuyamba. Tuukirira ofiisi y'okuyingibwa obutereevu.
